data.text: @gioographyyy Hola, te hemos enviado una respuesta vía DM. Saludos.

@StellarTravel2 Hola, brindamos asistencia en Inglés, Español y Portugués, por favor indícanos en qué idioma deseas asistencia y envíanos por medio de mensaje privado el código de reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 números) y el nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@hildelbrando2 Hola, envíanos por DM el código de reserva o número de orden y nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.

urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text:
@TontiLucero Anthony, we can provide it to you. Please send us a DM with the following information:
- Travel Voucher number.
- Full name of the holder.
- Number, type, and country of issue of the holder's ID.
- Email. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS
@TontiLucero Hi Anthony, if the expiration date of your voucher is December 31st 2021, it means that you can use it in whichever flight available (could be in 2022) until said date. Regards.

@CamiMartinezO Hola Cami, lamentamos el inconveniente. Para poder asistirte bríndanos tu código de reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 números), además del nombre y apellido del pasajero mediante nuestro DM. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@lil_art29 Hi, please send us via DM your protocol number, or booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

data.text: @helioyanagita Helio, keep in mind that case numbers are personal information, so we ask you delete your tweet, and contact us through DMs. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS
@helioyanagita Hi Helio, thanks for contacting us. Please tell us how can we assist you.
@BarbieCartonera Hola, te hemos contestado vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@BG420BG Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@javirodd7 Hola, para poder asistirte envíanos código de reserva o número de ticket y nombre completo del pasajero vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@dpinonavarro Hi, in order to assist you, please send us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
#AttentionPassengers. We are experiencing some technical difficulties with incoming calls to our Contact Center. To save time, please go to https://t.co/x1X3UC34NV Thanks for your understanding.

@MafaldaJuventud Hola, con el fin de brindarte asistencia, es necesario que nos indiques vía DM tu código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 dígitos numéricos) y el nombre completo de los pasajeros. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@dspiniak Hello, please provide us your reservation code and passenger full name via DM. We stay tuned.
@SHR_Harvick4 Thank you, Chad! 😎 ✈️
@RadarBox24 3 - Stormtrooper Plane, definitely! 😎 ✈️ 🖤
@aaronh125 Hello Aaron we've sent a direct message. Regards
@BernardKareemma Hi, thank you for contacting us. Please let us know if you have any specific request or requirement to be able to assist you. We will stay tuned.

@valerioluccio Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@SoyLatteYoga Hi, we sent you ar esponse via DM. Regards.
@rattrick1 Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@AndersonBrito_ + Estamos muito preocupados com essa situação, incluímos os seus comentários no protocolo #36197423 e pedimos prioridade. Logo entraremos em contato. Obrigado.
@AndersonBrito_ + Portanto, sabemos que em alguns momentos, o sistema pode apresentar intermitência, e isso muitas vezes faz com que cause desconforto aos nossos clientes+
@AndersonBrito_ Olá Anderson, boa noite. Compreendemos a sua insatisfação. O nosso interesse é que todos os nossos clientes possam utilizar os nossos serviços sem dificuldade +

@pointsintheair Hello, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@Pess_Play Harrison, let us know if you still need assistance. Bear in mind that we care about the opinion of our passengers, and we strive to continually improve our service. Regards.
@e_boliveira Hi, in order to assist you, please send us by DM the case number or the email address associated with the refund request. We look forward to your response.
@Pess_Play Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you further. Regards.

@mandyLo Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

@AAnnestedtLCSW Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@AAnnestedtLCSW Ashley, we are glad to know that. Thank you for get in touch with us. Have a nice day.

@g_l_johnson Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@sam45654552 Hi, if you still need our assistance, please let us know by DM the details of your inquiry regarding your LATAM pass account. We look forward to your response.

@AAnnestedtLCSW Hello Ashley, please let us know more details regarding via DM. Also, send us the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and passenger's full name. We'll stay tuned.
@rattrick1 Hi, in order to assist you, please send us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.

@mikeclyne Michael, we've replied through a DM. Regards.

@AbCharles79 Hi, our lines are under a high demand, and some passengers have reported having issued trying to contact us. Please send us a DM with details on your requirement to check whether we are able to assist you.

data.text: @laliux72 Hi, thanks for contacting us. In order to assist you, please send us a DM with your reservation code and the full name of whom is traveling. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS

@calvinhanson Hi Calvin, we'd like to look into your case and take the appropriate actions in order to speed up the process, so we'll need you to DM us your flight details and case/claim number. We await your reply.
@Chicken57943702 We are here to assist you. For any further inquiries, let us know. Kind regards.

urls.title: Special baggage | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Learn about the specifications for wheelchairs, musical instruments, and sports or audiovisual equipment. Always carry what you need with you.

data.text: @Chicken57943702 Hi, bear in mind that this kind of equipment is subject to a special baggage charge, and this baggage can be up to 320 cm long (10.4 ft), independent of width and height. More details here: https://t.co/VlTBRS2Dr3. Regards.

data.text: @naelav Hi, we sent you a response via DM. Likewise, in order to protect your personal data we recommend hiding your comment. Regards.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: @EliMezei Hi, the accepted type of tests to entry the USA are antigen test or nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT), including but not restricted to RT-PCR, RT-LAMP, TMA, NEAR, and HDA. You can get more information by entering the following link: https://t.co/YH640t3pOz
